data.title: Visa (V) Expands Contactless Payment Method Via Tap to Phone
data.text: Visa (V) strengthens its position as a global payment facilitator in the contactless space via its new Tap to Phone product.

data.title: Can Visa (V) Keep the Earnings Surprise Streak Alive?
data.text: Visa (V) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

data.title: 4 Stocks to Watch As Contactless Payment Gains Popularity
data.text: Contactless payment facilities of companies like Apple, Inc. (AAPL), Alphabet (GOOGL) and Visa (V) have gained traction since the coronavirus outbreak.

data.title: 4 Buffett Stocks That Can Be Surefire Winners Over the Next Decade
data.text: The Oracle of Omaha has a knack for picking out great companies.
